extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  Level 2 or above or 6.0 units at the 100 level in RELS

basic.description: Developments through 3,000 years of Indian history; the Upanishads, the Bhagavad Gita, Yoga and Vedanta, mythology of Vishnu and Shiva, and recent Hindu thinkers (e.g., Tagore, Aurobindo).
basic.subject: RELS
basic.title: The Hindu World
